None.Name: Protective Ice
None.Description: Friendly units and structures in a 15m radius take 50% less damage until 7800 damage has been absorbed. Lasts for 30 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Extra.en: Is not an ice shield. Stacks multiplicatively with other damage-reducing abilities or spells. Subtracts damage from both limits if stacked with Glacier Shell.
